stages.title: Arrival
stages.summary: You reached Stillnight. The air hums with sealed power.
stages.hint: Speak to Keeper Thane in town square.

stages.title: Chain Oath
stages.summary: Thane warned that three chains pin the Eternal Warden in place.
stages.hint: Break the Ember Chain on Floor 2.
stages.logOnAdvance: You swear to shatter the chains beneath Stillnight.

stages.title: Ember Chain Broken
stages.summary: The first seal snapped and heat spilled through the halls.
stages.hint: Hunt for the Tide Chain on Floor 4.
stages.logOnAdvance: The Ember Chain snaps; the dungeon exhales embers.

stages.title: Tide Chain Broken
stages.summary: The second seal dissolved into mist.
stages.hint: Seek the Veil Chain hidden in Floor 6.
stages.logOnAdvance: Water hushes as a chain dissolves. The depths feel nearer.

stages.title: Veil Chain Broken
stages.summary: All chains are shattered; the core is exposed.
stages.hint: Push to the Stillnight Core and confront the Eternal Warden.
stages.logOnAdvance: The last seal fractures; something stirs far below.

stages.title: Eternal Warden Fallen
stages.summary: The Warden is beaten, but the town awaits proof.
stages.hint: Return to Keeper Thane in town.
stages.logOnAdvance: The Eternal Warden crumbles; the chains are gone.

stages.title: Stillnight Freed
stages.summary: Keeper Thane acknowledges the lifted chains.
stages.hint: Celebrate with the townsfolk and gear up for endless runs.
stages.logOnAdvance: Stillnight exhales. New stories can begin.

stages.title: Clipped Courage
stages.summary: Alicia wants to confess to Laura but keeps freezing up.
stages.hint: Talk to Alicia in town.

stages.title: Steadying Nectar
stages.summary: Alicia asked for Luminous Nectar to calm her nerves.
stages.hint: Loot the Entry Hall chest and bring the Nectar back.

stages.title: Gleaming Proof
stages.summary: She wants an undead keepsake to hand to Laura herself.
stages.hint: Find a Gleaming Band from ghouls in the Rusted Choir.

stages.title: Standing Beside
stages.summary: Alicia stands with Laura openly, steadied by your support.
stages.hint: Check in after forging the vow ring.
stages.logOnAdvance: Alicia squares her shoulders and steps beside Laura.

stages.title: Restless Smith
stages.summary: Laura wants a memento from the undead to reforge into something honest.
stages.hint: Bring her a Gleaming Band.

stages.title: Etched Promise
stages.summary: She can work the band into a protective keepsake.
stages.hint: Deliver the band after Alicia steadies herself.
stages.logOnAdvance: Laura smiles as metal yields to her hammer.

stages.title: Blood Temper
stages.summary: She needs proof you can survive deep blood halls.
stages.hint: Fell a Crimson Lord to show her the path is open.
stages.logOnAdvance: The hammer rings brighter after the Crimson Lord falls.

stages.title: Promise Loop
stages.summary: With the Warden down, she can forge a final ring.
stages.hint: Return after the Eternal Warden falls.
stages.logOnAdvance: Laura slides a freshly forged Promise Loop across the anvil.

stages.title: Dented Inventory
stages.summary: Rian needs funding and a fresh Iron Sword to restart his line.
stages.hint: Bring him 50G and an Iron Sword from Floor 2.

stages.title: Ember Edge
stages.summary: He tempers a new edge, inspired by the Ember Chain’s heat.
stages.hint: Equip or stash the Ember Edge reward.
stages.logOnAdvance: Sparks fly as Rian grinds a new edge for you.

stages.title: Demonic Proof
stages.summary: He wants to see a Flauros fall before investing rarer stock.
stages.hint: Hunt a Flauros in the mid floors.
stages.logOnAdvance: Rian nods, satisfied with the demon’s ashes.

stages.title: Chainbreaker Guard
stages.summary: His shield line is ready, buoyed by your victories.
stages.hint: Check back after the Warden falls for a sturdier guard.
stages.logOnAdvance: A plated guard hits the counter with a reassuring thud.

stages.title: Quiet Solicitation
stages.summary: Mara wants proof you can handle the depths.
stages.hint: Find an Auction Notice near the Ember Chain.

stages.title: Side Hustle
stages.summary: She pays out coin for the notice and starts slipping you cuts.
stages.hint: Visit after each chain break for extra gold.
stages.logOnAdvance: Mara’s ledgers now include your name.

stages.title: Veiled Ledger
stages.summary: A hidden ledger could expose deeper buyers.
stages.hint: Recover the Veiled Ledger from Blood Chapel chests.
stages.logOnAdvance: She smirks and slides a Mirrorwork Cloak your way.

stages.title: Rare Circuit
stages.summary: With the Warden gone, Mara can auction openly.
stages.hint: Return after the Eternal Warden falls for rare pulls.
stages.logOnAdvance: Mara opens a velvet case of rarities just for you.
